History myocardial infarction stroke within 6 month . Clinically significant peripheral vascular disease . History abdominal fistula , gastrointestinal perforation intraabdominal abscess within 28 day prior Day 0 . Presence central nervous system brain mets . Evidence bleed diathesis coagulopathy . Metastatic infiltration liver > 50 % . Patients chronic diarrhea ( least 3 month ) partial bowel obstruction total colectomy . Active infection require antibiotic Day 1 .
